title: Bajaj Auto looks to sustain domestic business momentum; recover export volumes
description: Bajaj Auto aims to sustain momentum in domestic business and expand production capacity for new ventures. Chairman Niraj Bajaj expects robust demand in FY2024, with a focus on recovering export volumes.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
